languages.text: {n}Последние символы вгрызаются в плоть, и когда вам кажется, что ваше тело уже достигло предела, боль отступает. Благодать теплой волной окутывает вас, вымывая остатки порока. Ощупав лоб, вы понимаете, что на нем ни царапины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор вырезает символ на лбу, вода жжется изнутри. Святой свет.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Последние символы вгрызаются в плоть, и когда вам кажется, что ваше тело уже достигло предела, боль отступает. Благодать теплой волной окутывает вас, вымывая остатки порока. Ощупав лоб, вы понимаете, что на нем ни царапины.{/n}

A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最后的符号嵌入了你的血肉之中，就在你觉得身体已经承受到极限时，疼痛消失了。恩典的暖流涌上心头，洗掉了你所有的罪孽。你伸出手指，摸了摸自己的额头，发现上面一点伤痕都没有。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最后的符号嵌入了你的血肉之中，就在你觉得身体已经承受到极限时，疼痛消失了。恩典的暖流涌上心头，洗掉了你所有的罪孽。你伸出手指，摸了摸自己的额头，发现上面一点伤痕都没有。{/n}

languages.text: {n}最後のシンボルが肉体に食い込む。肉体の限界を迎えたと思った瞬間、痛みが和らいだ。温かな恩寵の波があなたを包み込み、最後の罪まで全て洗い流していった。指で額に触れると、そこには傷ひとつないことに気が付いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最後のシンボルが肉体に食い込む。肉体の限界を迎えたと思った瞬間、痛みが和らいだ。温かな恩寵の波があなたを包み込み、最後の罪まで全て洗い流していった。指で額に触れると、そこには傷ひとつないことに気が付いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los últimos símbolos penetran tu piel, y justo cuando sientes que tu cuerpo ha llegado al límite de lo que puede soportar, el dolor disminuye. Una cálida ola de gracia te envuelve, eliminando tus últimas transgresiones. Te pasas los dedos por la frente y te das cuenta de que no tienes ni un rasguño.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los últimos símbolos penetran tu piel, y justo cuando sientes que tu cuerpo ha llegado al límite de lo que puede soportar, el dolor disminuye. Una cálida ola de gracia te envuelve, eliminando tus últimas transgresiones. Te pasas los dedos por la frente y te das cuenta de que no tienes ni un rasguño.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die letzten Symbole beißen sich in dein Fleisch, und gerade als du spürst, dass dein Körper nicht noch mehr ertragen kann, lässt der Schmerz nach. Eine warme Welle der Gnade spült über dich hinweg und wäscht deine letzten Sünden fort. Du fährst dir mit den Fingern über die Stirn und stellst fest, dass kein einziger Kratzer zurückgeblieben ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}

Du fährst dir mit den Fingern über die Stirn und stellst fest, dass kein einziger Kratzer zurückgeblieben ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les derniers symboles viennent s'inscrire dans votre chair, et alors même que vous pensez avoir atteint la limite de ce que peut supporter votre corps, la douleur se dissipe, remplacée par une vague de grâce qui balaie toutes vos transgressions. Lorsque vous effleurez votre front du bout des doigts, vous vous rendez compte qu'il est intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}

Lorsque vous effleurez votre front du bout des doigts, vous vous rendez compte qu'il est intact.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son semboller etine işlenip de bedeninin kaldırabileceği acı seviyesine ulaştığını hissettiğinde eziyet sonlanıyor. Üzerine inen lütuf, bir dalga gibi son günahını da alıp götürüyor. Parmaklarını alnına götürüyorsun ama en ufak çizik dahi hissedemiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The final symbols bite into your flesh, and just as you feel your body has reached the limit of what it can take, the pain subsides. A warm wave of grace rolls over you, washing away the last of your transgressions. You run your fingers over your forehead and realise there is not a scratch on it.{/n}
